roleset.name: created by a human

example.name: arg1, concatenated and relemmatized rel
example.text: As a result , basically natural disasters happened in the past , now the disasters that take place in Japan are man - made , which are the consequences of the accumulation of murders and arson aimed at destroying the world . Just like drawing fire to themselves .
example.arg: the disasters that take place in Japan
which are the consequences of the accumulation of murders and arson aimed at destroying the world

roleset.note: MANMADE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from manmade.01-j)
May occur spelled as a single word, hyphenated, or as two words. Concatenate and relemmatize as necessary. (from manmade.01-j)
